title: Pandora Wild Child
description: Young and ADHD-driven, Pandora is unused to her sudden freedom.She whoops it up in college, living life and making #allthemistakes.Finally, she’s out of her oppressive father’s house! At a sizzling student club,everything sexy and perfect—as in Dominic,and everything beautiful and twisted—aka Leon, the club owner,have a way of leaving her breathless. There are rumors that you can find true love in college.But if you’re wild and off-leash,if you’ve got demons to battle and the world at your feet,surely, you can't be held accountable for your choices?
author: Sunniva Dee
